short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple and useful plugin for direct search on YOU.COM

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Discover the ease of searching with the YOU.COM Plugin, an intuitive and simple extension to enhance your online experience.

This extension allows you to perform direct searches in YouChat or in the search mode directly on YOU.COM.

In addition, it offers the YouWrite and YouImagine options, providing quick and direct access to these platforms with just one click.

Note: This application was developed by a YOU.COM user with the intention of learning how to develop an extension for Chrome. It is not intended to profit from the extension.
